Avoid failing when another middleware returns HttpResponse (closes #28)

This doesn't allow profiling other middleware classes when they do something
which returns a direct HttpResponse but it does avoid crashing every time
something triggers a redirect.

setup: add a license
Improve default logging behavior within devserver
Middleware should not return any response for process view
Force params to tuple for sql
Coerce params to tuple for formatting

devserver now replaces the runserver command. By default uses ForkMixIn, can pass --threaded for ThreadedMixIn. Can add --nologging to disable logging (devserver handlers). SQL queries will now output when they execute, and show the duration with num results (more useful for hanging queries)
Fix an issue caused when calls are set, but hits/misses are not
Replace django-db-log text :)
Adding license
Fixed an issue where DEVSERVER_TRUNCATE_AGGREGATES was not respected.
Fixes encoding error for modules which returns internationalized unicode strings.
